name: Funky Fingers
description:
★★ Who knew you had such Funky Fingers??!! ★★
Get that real board game sensation on the iPad. A game of and dexterity that is social and fun for all ages

★★★★★ "Awesome - This game is awesome" Da Realest 11
★★★★★ "Wows - OMG!! Had a blast playing the solo version as a two player with a friend. Its like playing twister with your fingers. Fun!!" Wawzie

---- ABOUT FUNKY FINGERS ----

Finally, a game that takes complete advantage of the iPad multi-touch!

Pumpkin on the orange target! Zombie on the pink target!
Use your ability to analyze and your dexterity to move characters toward their corresponding targets with your fingers. Be nice to them. Don’t push too hard or they’ll get away! Careful, once you’ve got your finger on a character, if you let it go, you only have 3 seconds to get it back before it explodes. The targets move between rounds. Establish a strategy to move each character back onto its target… without ever getting your fingers tangled up!

Funky Fingers is a simple, intuitive and accessible game for everyone from 7 to 77, with two modes:

★ Challenge yourself in SOLO MODE: develop your analytical ability, your dexterity and your practical side to unlock new characters.

★ Get together in MULTI-PLAYER MODE: challenge each other in teams and rediscover the pleasure of collaborative games on a whole new playing field... the iPad! Gone are the days of never-ending games, lost game pieces and bulky boxes.
As a family, between friends or at work, put your heads together and get all tangled up around a friendly strategy game.

At each level, earn “Funky” points and get ranked in the Game Center.

Are you Funky enough to complete all the levels?

Characteristics:

Entirely multi-touch
- 11 tactile points
- 30 different animated characters
- High-definition animated graphics
- 2 modes: solo mode and multi-player mode
- 3 themes: 60s, Horror, Pirates
- 6 levels in each theme
- A Funky Club to buy new levels

★ The Funky Club: dive into worlds that are even funkier ★
Access the Funky Club and get 50 new levels by theme.
